jobs.name: Tramp
jobs.description: You wander in the streets...

jobs.name: App slave
jobs.description: You get orders from an app, then have to do everything asked. Faster than this if you want to keep a good rating.

jobs.name: Kitchen worker
jobs.description: In a dark kitchen, you cook a new, AI created menu every day. Strangely, that AI really pushes octopus sandwiches.

jobs.name: Factory worker
jobs.description: You do the same task all day.

jobs.name: Scammer
jobs.description: You sell fake memory cards in the streets.

jobs.name: Thief
jobs.description: You steal small things to stay under the radar.

jobs.name: Troll farmer
jobs.description: It ain't much but it's... online manipulation.

jobs.name: Drug dealer
jobs.description: You sell drugs everywhere in the city.

jobs.name: Gang leader
jobs.description: You have a small team of various talents in crime.

jobs.name: Criminal consortium president
jobs.description: You are the head of a cartel of criminal organizations.

jobs.name: Security agent by night
jobs.description: You stay all night in a warehouse and hope nothing happens

jobs.name: Bodyguard for Hire
jobs.description: You safeguard the lives of important and notorious figures of the city.

jobs.name: Security Consultant
jobs.description: Protect corporate secrets by securing their physical and digital assets. Never a dull moment.

jobs.name: Security Drones Swarm Specialist
jobs.description: You manage thousands of drones that can record every movement in the city.

jobs.name: Security Company CEO
jobs.description: You are the leader of a security company managing all security issues for companies, individuals or public organizations.

jobs.name: Script kiddy
jobs.description: You buy scripts on the dark web, hoping they will work, and run a few scams.

jobs.name: Data Smuggler
jobs.description: You transport sensitive data through the darkest corners of the web, bypassing every form of digital surveillance.

jobs.name: Software Cracker
jobs.description: You unlock software protections aginst copies. A few fans love you for being always the first to crack the latest upgrade of their favorite app.

jobs.name: Elite Hacker
jobs.description: From heists on the data banks of mega-corporations to cyber warfare, you are a ghost in the machine.

jobs.name: Cybernetic Espionage Agent
jobs.description: You infiltrate the digital fortresses of corporate entities and governments, silently extracting secrets that shift the power balance of the city.

jobs.name: AI specialist
jobs.description: You are the person that create life from nothing. It's constantly eating data and super useful. It will probably end badly of course.

jobs.name: Architect of the Matrix
jobs.description: You don't just hack the system, you rewrite it. Laws of the digital realm bend to your will.

jobs.name: Cybernetics Clinic Owner
jobs.description: You operate a clinic that offers cybernetic enhancements. Business is booming as everyone wants to be better, faster, stronger.

jobs.name: Underground Bar Proprietor
jobs.description: Your bar is a hub for the city’s misfits and outcasts. The drinks are strong and the secrets traded are even stronger.

jobs.name: Virtual Entertainment Complex Owner
jobs.description: You own a Virtual Reality hub, where patrons lose themselves in different realities. Reality is a commodity and you re selling it.

jobs.name: Megacorp CEO
jobs.description: You are at the helm of a megacorporation, steering the course of the city’s future. Power is your game.

jobs.name: OmniCartel CEO
jobs.description: Your company owns nearly everything in the world.

skills.name: Relaxation
skills.description: The ability to find inner peace boosts your capacity to learn.

skills.name: Logic
skills.description: Enhance your cognitive abilities, making you a better problem-solver and thus improving your efficiency at work.

skills.name: Frugality
skills.description: Master the art of making the most of resources. A crucial skill for someone who started with nothing.

skills.name: Charisma
skills.description: Your charisma allows you to influence others with ease, proving beneficial in work situations and increasing your revenue.

skills.name: Street Cred
skills.description: Your reputation on the streets can prove to be an important asset, facilitating your advancement in the world of crime.

skills.name: Heist Mastery
skills.description: Become a seasoned criminal, adept at maximizing profits from every unlawful venture.

skills.name: Underworld Connections
skills.description: Your connections in the seedy underbelly of the city pay off, yielding more valuable information and resources.

skills.name: Security Protocols
skills.description: Understand and exploit the intricate security systems that protect the megacorps.

skills.name: Vigilant Sentinel
skills.description: Your alertness and tactical acumen turn every security gig into a gold mine.

skills.name: Defensive Specialist
skills.description: Advance your knowledge of defensive strategies, making you more valuable in the security field.

skills.name: Digital Shadows
skills.description: Navigate the intricate webs of the net, making every hacking operation a learning experience.

skills.name: Data Heist Pro
skills.description: Your expert hacking skills ensure maximum rewards from every data heist.

skills.name: Code Guru
skills.description: Elevate your coding prowess, making you a digital force to be reckoned with.

skills.name: Corporate Savvy
skills.description: Your business acumen ensures a steep learning curve in the cutthroat corporate world.

skills.name: Merger Mogul
skills.description: Negotiate, manipulate, and profit. You always come out on top of every business transaction.

skills.name: Influence Broker
skills.description: Your ability to influence others and build relationships makes you a key player in the business world.

homes.name: Flat-sharing with a drug addict
homes.description: Life in here is hell, but you have a roof over the head.

homes.name: Slum Shack
homes.description: A dilapidated abode, where pests are the landlords. It leaks when it rains, but it is home.

homes.name: Old Motel Room
homes.description: The stains on the walls and carpet tell a thousand tales. Not the best, but private.

homes.name: Underground Bunker
homes.description: A repurposed fallout shelter. Cold, metallic, safe.

homes.name: Apartment in the Stacks
homes.description: A tiny box in the towering stacks. The neon lights outside never shut off.

homes.name: Converted Warehouse Loft
homes.description: Spacious, raw, with a touch of industrial aesthetics. Your haven in the urban jungle.

homes.name: Luxury Micro-Apartment
homes.description: Small yet modern, with smart appliances. A perfect fusion of style and technology.

homes.name: Penthouse in a High-rise
homes.description: A sky-high oasis with a panoramic city view. The pinnacle of metropolitan living.

homes.name: Retrofitted Industrial Complex
homes.description: A fortress of solitude amidst the chaos. Privacy and security at its finest.

homes.name: Cyber Mansion
homes.description: The ultimate dwelling of affluence, digitally enhanced for maximum comfort and security.

gears.name: Tablet
gears.description: The screen is cracked and it is really old.

gears.name: Old laptop
gears.description: An outdated laptop with rusty edges, yet still capable of performing basic tasks.

gears.name: Virus scripts
gears.description: A collection of scripts used to steal money.

gears.name: Security Drone
gears.description: A compact, remotely-controlled drone designed for surveillance and security.

gears.name: Stealth Suit
gears.description: Advanced stealth suit, ideal for covert operations.

gears.name: Bio-Monitor
gears.description: A wearable device that continuously monitors physiological information.

gears.name: Neuro-Stimulant
gears.description: A potent nootropic drug that enhances cognitive abilities.

gears.name: Quantum PC
gears.description: A next-generation quantum computer capable of hacking sophisticated systems.

gears.name: Data-Goggles
gears.description: Advanced eyewear that can analyze digital data and identify vulnerabilities.
gears.effectDescription: x(multiplier) Data Heist Pro skill XP

gears.name: Business super AI
gears.description: You get access to an exclusive AI helping on reports on market and decision-making.

gears.name: Stock market super AI
gears.description: The price is high, but this allow you to predict the future of the stock market.

gears.name: Knowledge Enhancer
gears.description: An implant that increases the user's learning speed and capacity.
